summary: This mod is my take on Umbra.
descriptionHtml:
This mod is my take on Umbra. I know there are other Umbra mods out there, but I felt like they were missing something. The design was based on Morrowind\'s Umbra, and the stats based on Oblivion\'s. I also added in the \"ebony blade effect\" (i.e. it never runs out of enchantment). A very fun sword to use... if you can find it.

CHANGELOG
V1.0- initial release

Thanks to:
-frostnads for giving me this idea
-anyone who comments with ideas for this mod
author: IronPlatypus
